sect2.title: Installation command explanations
sect2.para: Create the group and user news, if not present. Errors resulting from an already existing user or group news may be ignored.
--prefix=/usr : Change the default installation directory of /usr/local.
--localstatedir=/var : Change the default spool directory of /usr/var.
--sysconfdir=/etc/news : leafnode reads it's configuration data from an file called config, this with be created in /etc/news to avoid any potential conflict with other packages.
make update : Create an initial /etc/news/config.example file, which must be renamed to /etc/news/config.
